T02TD2847E:185a-0: @185a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2847E:185a-1: yon tan ma lus rgya mtsho yi //
T02TD2847E:185a-2: mthar phyin gser 'od kha dog can //
T02TD2847E:185a-3: mdzad pa gcig gis gdul bya yi //
T02TD2847E:185a-4: dpag med don grub nyid zhabs 'dud //
T02TD2847E:185a-5: / sngon du goms pa thob pa yis //
T02TD2847E:185a-6: tshogs pa tshang bar byas nas ni //
T02TD2847E:185a-7: snying rje can gyi pags pa la //
T02TD2847E:185a-8: mi g-yo rdo rje'i phyag rgyas 'dug / me yi las sam gtor mar bcas //
T02TD2847E:185a-9: gus pa drag pos mchod sngon 'gro //
T02TD2847E:185a-10: rim dang cig char bskyod pa'i rim //
T02TD2847E:185a-11: mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom //
T02TD2847E:185a-12: ji snyed sku gsung thugs rten yod //
T02TD2847E:185a-13: de snyed ston pa nyid yin te //
T02TD2847E:185a-14: rab tu gnas pa mi 'thad mod //
T02TD2847E:185a-15: lhag par gnas phyir rab gnas brjod //
T02TD2847E:185a-16: de la sku khrus byug pa sogs //
T02TD2847E:185a-17: phu dud byas la mdzes zhugs te //
T02TD2847E:185a-18: slob dpon lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2847E:185a-19: ye shes bsdus la gnyis pa gzhug / aom a'a:hr'i:dza:/
T02TD2847E:185a-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2847E:185a-24: mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel //
T02TD2847E:185a-25: mdzub mo gnyis ni lcags kyu'i tshul //
T02TD2847E:185a-27: de las mdzub mo gnyis bkug dang //
T02TD2847E:185a-28: rdo rje bsdams dang gar bsgyur ba //
T02TD2847E:185a-29: dgug pa bcing dang dgyes bya ba //
T02TD2847E:185a-30: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD2847E:185a-31: ji ltar bdag nyid la bcings pa //
T02TD2847E:185a-32: de bzhin rten la yang yin te //
T02TD2847E:185a-33: bcings nas dbang bskur rgyas gdab dang //
T02TD2847E:185a-34: mchod pa la sogs bdag 'jug bzhin //
T02TD2847E:185a-35: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra k'a ya w'aka tsitta pra tisthi r'a h'um h'um badzra dzny'a na aa dhishth'a ni sarba laksha na pa ri p'u ra h'um h'um h'um sarba dha rm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shuddh'a bi ma la da ma h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2847E:185a-36: rdo rje'i lus kyi padma'i lag / rin chen me tog snyim par bzung //
T02TD2847E:185a-37: 'khor lo'i gar bsgyur rgya tham gyi //
T02TD2847E:185a-38: phyag rgya ldan pas gtor bar bya //
T02TD2847E:185a-39: de nas me tog rtsi thog bcud //
T02TD2847E:185a-40: dri bzang mang dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2847E:185a-41: gser gyi thur ma rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD2847E:185a-42: thogs la mkhas pas spyan dbye'o //
T02TD2847E:185a-43: aom a'a:hr'i:tsakshu tsakshu badzra tsakshu sa manta tsakshu pi sho dha ya tsakshu ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2847E:185b-0: ci 'byor pa'i yon phul te bzod par gsol nas 'khor ba ji @185b srid par bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2847E:185b-1: phrin las la thogs pa med par gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2847E:185b-2: dga' ston dang mchod sbyin chen pos thams cad yongs su tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2847E:185b-4: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga grub pa brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po aa dzi ta mi tra guptas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2847E:185b-6: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shr'i dza ga ta mi tr'a nanta'i zhal snga dang /
T02TD2847E:185b-7: kha che'i pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i dzny'a nas gtan la phab nas /
T02TD2847E:185b-8: bod kyi lo ts'a ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba'o//
